results.title: A phase I trial of metformin in combination with vincristine, irinotecan, and temozolomide in children with relapsed or refractory solid and central nervous system tumors: A report from the national pediatric cancer foundation
results.text_hl: Concurrently to the @DISEASE_Precursor_Cell_Lymphoblastic_Leukemia_Lymphoma @DISEASE_MESH:D054198 @@@ALL@@@ trial, and based on preclinical evidence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ anticancer activity and the lack of established dosing tolerance in adults, we sought to determine the safety and tolerability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ when combined with VIT in relapsed and refractory pediatric solid and @<m>DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016543 @@@CNS tumors@@@.

citations.NLM: Metts JL, Trucco M, Weiser DA, Thompson P, Sandler E, Smith T, Crimella J, Sansil S, Thapa R, Fridley BL, Llosa N, Badgett T, Gorlick R, Reed D, Gill J. A phase I trial of metformin in combination with vincristine, irinotecan, and temozolomide in children with relapsed or refractory solid and central nervous system tumors: A report from the national pediatric cancer foundation Cancer Med. 2022 Sep 23;():. PMID: 36151773
